AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.2.29
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

CompressibilityFactor.h
1 #ifndef AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_COMPRESSIBILITYFACTOR_H
2 #define AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_COMPRESSIBILITYFACTOR_H
3 
4 #include <cmath>
5 
6 class CompressibilityFactor {
7 public:
8 
18  CompressibilityFactor(const double moverShaftPower, const double inletPressure, const double outletPressure,
19  const double barometricPressure, const double flowRate, const double specificHeatRatio)
20  : moverShaftPower(moverShaftPower), inletPressure(inletPressure), outletPressure(outletPressure),
21  barometricPressure(barometricPressure), flowRate(flowRate), specificHeatRatio(specificHeatRatio)
22  {}
23 
24  double calculate() {
25  double const p1 = inletPressure + 13.63 * barometricPressure;
26  double const x = (outletPressure - inletPressure) / p1;
27  double const z = ((6362 * moverShaftPower / flowRate) / p1) * ((specificHeatRatio - 1) / specificHeatRatio);
28 
29  return std::log(1 + x) * z / (std::log(1 + z) * x);
30  }
31 
32 private:
33  const double moverShaftPower, inletPressure, outletPressure, barometricPressure, flowRate, specificHeatRatio;
34 };
35 
36 
37 #endif //AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_COMPRESSIBILITYFACTOR_H

CompressibilityFactor(const double moverShaftPower, const double inletPressure, const double outletPressure, const double barometricPressure, const double flowRate, const double specificHeatRatio)
